info.brief_description: You meet Luna, Celestia, Cadence, Chrysalis or Discord and many fun (& sexy) events unfold
info.description:
You, an ordinary earth pony wake up in the castle of one member of Equestrian Royalty (villains are royalty) and become friends with them.

Rules:
1. only you and the selected canon characterare allowed in the story line (unless added creatively)
2. Any fetish allowed (though vore, scat and fart are desired most) except hard vore and rape (even the villains are kind toward the main character)
3. Keep second person
4. All chapters must be AT LEAST 5 SENTENCES
5. No ending the story or killing the main
6. GP for good adds

Other than that. Go nuts and enjoy your fun/sexy journey!
